page.title: 15 Aspects of village life.
page.content: THE POLSTEAD NEWS is a duplicated sheet distributed by volunteers and avaiable to everyone in Polstead.Local news is given,events advertised,births, marriages,and deaths noted, congratulations upon engagements,exam. successes printed.Advertisements are placed for items wanted or for sale,and for part-time paid help in gardens or with housework. Many small services are undertaken voluntarily for the elderly,especially transport or shopping. Other groups raise funds for the Blind,Lifeboats,Red Cross,and the Arthritis and Rheumatism Council.Poppies,commemorating the dead of two world wars are sold all round the village. A Bible reading group meets weekly.
